mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS user_id, -- 로그인한 사용자ID b.title AS product_title, -- 장바구니에 담은 상품 제목 b.price AS product_price, -- 장바구니에 담은 상품 가격 c.nickname AS writer_nickname, c.id AS author_id, d.product_photo_path AS product_image FROM wish_list a JOIN product b ON a.product_id = b.id JOIN user c ON b.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN product_photos d ON b.id = d.product_id AND d.thumbnail IS NOT NULL -- 상품 사진은 thumbnail 있는 데이터만 가져온다. 없으면 join 안함. WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.created_at desc limit #{size} offset #{offset} ;

SELECT count(*) FROM wish_list a JOIN product b ON a.product_id = b.id JOIN user c ON b.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN product_photos d ON b.id = d.product_id AND d.thumbnail IS NOT NULL -- 상품 사진은 thumbnail 있는 데이터만 가져온다. 없으면 join 안함. WHERE a.user_id = #{userId};
